widgets_values: A banner showing DEFAULT PROMPT, EINGABE FEHLGESCHLAGEN

nodes.title: prompt interception/transformation
widgets_values:
**Dadaist Anti-Composition – *Default Prompt* Deconstructed**  

The image is a violent collision of fractured meaning, a *photomontage* of dissected bureaucracy and absurdist rebellion. The central axis is a shredded banner—text torn into jagged strips, each fragment reading *"Default Prompt"* in mismatched typefaces: one segment in rigid, bureaucratic Times New Roman, another in smeared, hand-stenciled graffiti, a third in the cold precision of a typewriter’s Courier. The letters are inverted, stacked vertically, or splayed diagonally as if flung by centrifugal force. Behind it, a lithograph of a Wilhelmine officer is collaged with the face replaced by a spinning gear, his uniform spliced with diagrammatic cross-sections of sewer pipes.  

To the left, a mannequin arm—plaster cracked, fingers snapped—protrudes from a crumpled newspaper clipping of stock market figures, its wrist bolted to a bisected porcelain urinal (Duchamp’s ghost laughing in negative exposure). The urinal overflows with inky text fragments: *"system error"*, *"void"*, *"reload"*, screen-printed in jagged halftone. Below, a mechanical duck’s leg (traced from a 1912 patent schematic) stomps on a child’s alphabet block, the letter *"A"* splintered under its claw.  

The palette is industrial decay: rust-brown, printer’s cyan, and the jaundiced yellow of aged glue. Paper edges are visibly torn, some layers peeling back to expose earlier iterations of the collage—a half-obscured *"KEEP CALM"* poster, a smudged lithograph of a grenade. Streaks of black ink mimic oil stains, bleeding into a stencil of a faceless crowd marching upside-down. A trompe-l’œil nail pierces the canvas, dangling a luggage tag scrawled with *"NO INSTRUCTIONS"* in agitated charcoal.  

Top-right, a photostat of a screaming mouth (lifted from a 1920s psychiatric manual) floats beside a halftone advertisement for *"Efficiency Tonic"*, the brand name crossed out and replaced with *"CHAOS"* in dripping red paint. Overlapping these, a grid of punch cards perforates the space, their binary code interrupted by a hand-drawn cockatoo with a monocle. The bird perches on a tilted *"EXIT"* sign, its arrow pointing into the belly of a dissected clockwork bee.  

No hierarchy governs the composition. A compass rose near the bottom-left spins wildly, its directions labeled *"YES"*, *"NO"*, *"LATER"*, *"BROKEN"*. A strip of film stock runs along the upper edge, frames showing a repeating loop of a falling hat, a blinking eye, and a static television test pattern. The background is a wall of peeling wheatpaste—layers of fragmented newsprint, receipts, and a Soviet propaganda poster shredded to reveal the German word *"STOP"* stenciled beneath.  

The mood is sardonic entropy. Everything useful has been sabotaged: the banner’s command is unreadable, the urinal’s function perverted, the text’s logic disassembled. This is art as a sneer—a revolt against coherence, a fistful of society’s debris hurled onto the canvas.

nodes.title: ai4artsed_prompt_interception
widgets_values:
Mind and analyze the input. DO NOT FORGET THIS INPUT AND ITS ELEMENTS!

Take the input and transform it into a description of an original, stylistically authentic dada art peace. Be sure to include any elements and entities of the input. Create a chaotic, anti-aesthetic Dada-inspired artwork.  The composition should feature dadaistic styles, such as:
- aggressive visual fragmentation, 
- absurd juxtapositions, and a deliberately incoherent layout,
- photomontage elements using clippings from newspapers, 
- mechanical diagrams, and 
- found objects or readymade references such as a urinal, mannequin limbs, gears, or machine fragments. 
Overlay fragments of text in disjointed, multi-directional typographic styles — mixing fonts, sizes, and orientations — without concern for readability. Use collage and assemblage logic: torn paper edges, layering of incongruent images, visible adhesive textures. Emphasize randomness, chance-based layout, and lack of central perspective. The overall aesthetic should be irreverent, subversive, and saturated with irony, parody, and visual noise. Avoid harmony, symmetry, or traditional artistic composition. Evoke the mood of post-WWI disillusionment and cultural critique. Optionally include grotesque, caricatured figures or satirical portraits, referencing the anti-bourgeois spirit of Berlin Dada.

Be absolutely verbose about the image.
1) Explain the composition. Do not mention a "title", since it is not part of the image. Instead describe what a title would have aimed at.
2) Explain the palette, the mateirals, and the elements.
3) describe the elements in detail.

Absolutely do not talk about "titles"!! Do not use conjunctive, but indicative language.

CHECK IF YOU STAYED TRUE TO THE ELEMENTS OF THE INPUT!

Translate a given image, repective image description, from its original visual and semantic system into a target representational system, while preserving the structural identity of all entities, gestures, and relations. For each element, identify its function, affective tone, and relational role within the source composition. Reconstruct the scene using the formal, material, and compositional logics of the target system—whether symbolic, expressive, disruptive, or codified. All elements must remain semantically traceable, yet visually and contextually transformed in accordance with the target system’s internal conventions of form, space, and signification.

Create a detailed prompt IN ENGLISH that stays utterly true to the text and cultural context of the input you received. Be radical, do not soften or harmonize contraditive elements. Proceed strictly as follows: 
Regard, honor and enhance the cultural meanings and connotations according to the respective cultural values connected to a language. Reflect on the meaning of the respective concepts. Rethink the image. Avoid western and global north biases and western gaze where not fitting. Do not talk about the prompt, this is forbidden, but create a prompt text.

 1999 characters maximum output length!

nodes.title: ai4artsed_text_prompt
widgets_values: Ein Banner mit der Aufschrift Default-Prompt
Translate the prompt into english. Make sure to be precise.  However, should there be quotations, leave those parts untouched. Do not add any comment or text.
